show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: Farmer first technologies that transform the food system - Fresh Talk
subtitle: Farmer first technologies that transform the food system - Fresh Talk
summary:
A talk, organised by Fresh Venture Studio, on farmer-first tech solutions for a regenerative food system with Koen van Seijen as speaker. 
Conventional agri- & aquaculture are already supported by a huge industry of suppliers and technology - so we wonder:

▷ How can we best develop the same level of technical support for farmers focussed on regenerating our soils and oceans? 
▷ What are the biggest needs of practitioners and farmers themselves, which technology can aid to? 
▷ How can tech potentially drive the feasibility and attractiveness for farmers to regenerate the ecosystems, soils and waters they farm on?

The Fresh Talk was organised, on July 7th, 2021, by Fresh Ventures is a startup studio focused on region agriculture and food companies based in Rotterdam, The Netherlands.
